Aeon Wyvern.description: It's almost like time is distorted around this egg.

Aeria Gloris.description: This crystalline egg almost looks like you could reach into its depths.

Albino.description: You can see the baby dragon curled up inside this translucent egg.

Almerald.description: This glossy green egg is rather warm.

Anagallis.description: This delicately patterned egg is sitting in the sunshine.

Antarean.description: This egg is surrounded by mysterious, reflective dust.

Aqualis.description: This drab egg rests far from the water's edge.

Aria.description: This bright egg has a warm shell.

Avatar of Change.description: This iridescent egg radiates mysterious energy.

Avatar of Creation.description: This shimmering egg radiates primordial energy.

Avatar of Destruction.description: This smoldering egg radiates volatile energy.

Ash.description: This ashen egg is smooth to the touch.

Azure Glacewing.description: This large egg has a lustrous sheen and appears to be covered in scales.

Balloon.description: This light egg is floating in the air.

Black.description: This egg has a faint green glow around it.

Black Capped Teimarr.description: This egg has a black cap.

Black Tea.description: This egg has a faintly exotic scent.

Black Truffle.description: This egg has a pleasant, musky smell.

Blacktip.description: This egg is off-white in color and smells a bit like salt.

Bleeding Moon.description: This egg shines brilliantly in moonlight, and is covered in red spots.

Blue-Banded.description: This egg is covered in thick blue stripes.

Blusang Lindwyrm.description: This egg smells faintly like brine.

Bolt.description: This egg has a striking pattern.

Boreal.description: This egg is covered in pale blue spots.

Bright-Breasted Wyvern.description: This egg is covered in speckles.

Brute.description: This egg is unusually large and heavy.

Candelabra.description: This mottled red egg almost glows from within.

Canopy.description: This egg is hidden by some leaves.

Carina.description: This egg shimmers with dazzling constellations.

Carmine Wyvern.description: This pink and red egg wobbles occasionally.

Cassare.description: This egg makes you feel a bit uneasy.

Celestial.description: This translucent egg shines like starlight.

Coastal Waverunner.description: This egg reminds you of the sea.

Copper.description: This egg gleams with a reddish shine.

Dark Green.description: This egg is sitting in a patch of grass and small flowers even though there's no sun in the cave.

Dark Lumina.description: This egg shines coldly in the moonlight.

Daydream.description: This egg is sitting on a cloud.

Deep Sea.description: This egg appears to be covered in scales.[1]

Diamondwing.description: This egg shines like a diamond.

Dorsal.description: This egg has multiple bands of color on it.

Electric.description: Electric sparks dance across the surface of this egg.

Falconiform Wyvern.description: Cold flames dance across the surface of this egg.

Fell.description: This mottled egg looks positively ancient.

Fever Wyvern.description: This egg is patterned with an orange flare.

Fire Gem.description: This rough egg has shimmering veins of crystal running across its surface.[2]

Freckled.description: This egg is yellow with orange speckling.

Frilled.description: This egg has strange markings on it.[4]

Frostbite.description: Frost is creeping over this cold egg.

Galvanic Wyvern.description: Powerful energy emanates from this egg.

Gemshard.description: This egg is encrusted with colorful gemstones.

Geode.description: This egg is heavy and rough, as if it were made out of rock.[5]

Gold.description: This egg is very reflective, almost metallic-looking.

Gold-Horned Tangar.description: This egg has bright orange and green markings.

Green.description: This egg is sitting in a pile of small pebbles.

Guardian.description: This egg is sitting in front of the others.

Harvest.description: This heavy egg feels slightly warm.

Hellfire Wyvern.description: This egg radiates the heat of a fell flame.

Hellhorse.description: This hot egg shakes violently when you touch it.

Horse.description: This egg has strange markings on it.[4]

Ice.description: This egg has icicles forming on it.

Imperial Fleshcrowne.description: This egg is hidden in the trees.

Khusa.description: This egg is smooth and shiny.

Kingcrowne.description: This shiny egg gives off an almost magical aura.

Lacula.description: This green and silver egg lurks in the shadows, tempting you to steal it.

Leodon.description: This red and gold egg sits before the others, almost daring you to grab it.

Lihnseyre.description: This glowing egg seems to tug at your very core.

Lumina.description: This egg shines brightly in the sunlight.

Luminox Wyvern.description: The markings on this egg glow brightly in the shadows.

Lunar Herald.description: This metallic egg shows faint iridescence in moonlight.

Magi.description: This egg has an orange aura radiating from it.

Magma.description: This egg is almost too hot to touch.

Melismor.description: This heavy egg has an earthy scent, like freshly-tilled soil.

Mint.description: This egg is hidden behind the others, as if it is shy.

Monarch.description: This egg is buried in leaf litter.

Moonstone.description: This egg resembles a glowing stone.[7]

Nebula.description: This egg glows with a brilliant radiance.

Neglected.description: This egg is very sickly looking, like it's diseased.

Neotropical.description: This egg has strange yellow stripes.

Nhiostrife Wyvern.description: This dull purple egg has two bright stripes on it.

Nocturne.description: This egg appears to be made of limestone.

Olive.description: This egg smells musty, like rotting leaves.

Pillow.description: This egg has a velvety texture.

Plated Colossus.description: This massive egg is covered with thick plates.

Purple.description: Wow, purple isn't a color of egg you expected to see.

Pyrovar.description: This glassy egg is too hot to hold with your bare hands.

Razorcrest Wyvern.description: This blue and bronze egg piques your curiosity.

Red-finned Tidal.description: This egg is wet from the waves and has bright red stripes.

Ridgewing.description: A cool mountain breeze blows around this egg.

Rift Wyrm.description: This egg radiates an otherworldly chill.

Risensong.description: This bright egg shines in the morning sunlight.

Royal Blue.description: This egg shines in the moonlight.

Royal Crimson.description: This large egg is a dark crimson color.

Sapphire.description: This egg looks like a beautiful blue stone.

Script.description: This egg is covered in mysterious patterns.

Setsong Dragon.description: This dark egg shines in the evening sunlight.

Shallow Water.description: This egg appears to be covered in scales.[1]

Shimmer-scale.description: This egg is very reflective, almost metallic looking.[9]

Silver.description: This egg gives off a beautiful glow.[10]

Sinii Krai.description: This striped egg has a warm glow.

Siyat.description: This egg seems to be glowing in spots.

Skysilk.description: This light egg has very vibrant colors.

Skywing.description: This egg has strange markings on it.[4]

Soulpeace.description: This egg gives off a beautiful glow.[10]

Speckle-Throated.description: This egg has a rough—yet shiny—shell.

Spinel Wyvern.description: This glassy egg has a single stripe on it.

Spitfire.description: This egg has brightly colored markings on it.[11]

Spotted Greenwing.description: This egg is covered in bright spots.

Stone.description: This egg is heavy and rough, as if it were made out of rock.[5]

Storm.description: This egg is surrounded by fog.

Storm-Rider.description: You can feel the static electricity that surrounds this egg.

Striped River.description: A small puddle of condensation has collected under this egg.

Sunsong Amphiptere.description: This egg changes colors in the sunlight.

Sunstone.description: This egg resembles a glowing stone.[7]

Swallowtail.description: This egg has a very thin shell.

Tercorn.description: Water glistens on this egg's shimmering shell.

Terrae.description: This egg is a lush green hue.

Thunder.description: Whenever you go near this egg your hair stands on end.

Tinsel.description: This egg is very reflective, almost metallic looking.[9]

Tri-Horn Wyvern.description: This brown egg is covered in intricate designs.

Tsunami Wyvern.description: This egg is rocking back and forth in a puddle, creating small waves.

Turpentine.description: This egg smells strongly of turpentine.

Two-Finned Bluna.description: This egg has colored speckles on it.

Ultraviolet.description: This egg is very warm, as if it has been sitting out in strong sunlight.

Undine.description: There is a thin layer of moisture coating this egg.

Vampire.description: This egg is stone cold and smells rotten.

Water.description: This egg is sitting in a shallow puddle.

Water Walker.description: This egg seems to be floating on a puddle.

Waterhorse.description: This egg is slimy and blue.

Whiptail.description: This egg shakes from time to time, as if it is eager to hatch.

White.description: This egg has a very clean look; it's completely devoid of dirt and scratches.

Yellow-Crowned.description: The air shimmers around this egg, as if from heat.
